metadata.title: CVE-2023-52798 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  wifi: ath11k: fix dfs radar event locking  The ath11k active pdevs are protected by RCU but the DFS radar event handling code calling ath11k_mac_get_ar_by_pdev_id() was not marked as a read-side critical section.  Mark the code in question as an RCU read-side critical section to avoid any potential use-after-free issues.  Compile tested only.
